title: @Riot - Can you add the shrink effect you put on Urgot to Sona's W passive like you had planned
body:
And any other damage reduction abilities in the game, But I don't think there are?

Still irks me that this effect was originally for Sona's W but you removed it due to it being "buggy" even though it would have made the ability a lot clearer
Seems you fixed it now since Urgot is getting the effect for reducing enemy damage and size by 15%

Plus the ability is called Diminuendo...and it doesn't diminish the target

replies.body: If it ends up working well on Urgot we'll throw it on Sona as well. If it doesn't, we'll take it off Urgot.
Wouldn't the shrink effect just be nerf to the ability though? Since with a smaller model, it's harder to hit them with skillshots but it doesn't affect them very much.

> [{quoted}](name=Morcleon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xy1XwmVw,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-11-03T06:46:58.021+0000)
>
> Wouldn't the shrink effect just be nerf to the ability though? Since with a smaller model, it's harder to hit them with skillshots but it doesn't affect them very much.

I think it might be just clarity unless Urgot's also shrinks the hitbox.

I don't think it will actually make much of a difference in terms of hitbox size, they could probably get away without even adjusting the hitbox size on champs effected by damage reduction
unless we get a champion with like 50% reduction

Interesting, just as a general comment, Diminuendo is in pretty dire need of clarity anyway, I can only hope that something like this will make my allies actually notice that the enemy is weaker

Thanks for the comment
